attr.pathogenesis: increased intestinal permeability, fluid and blood loss into the intestinal lumen, and mucosal necrosis

reference: Unterer S, Busch K. Acute hemorrhagic diarrhea syndrome in dogs. Vet Clin North Am Small Anim Pract. 2021;51(1):79-92. doi:10.1016/j.cvsm.2020.09.007

attr.pathogenesis: increased intestinal permeability, fluid and blood loss

reference: Acute Hemorrhagic Diarrhea Syndrome in Dogs - MSD Veterinary Manual. https://www.msdvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-large-intestine-in-small-animals/acute-hemorrhagic-diarrhea-syndrome-in-dogs

attr.mechanism of action: toxin production, particularly netE and netF toxins

reference: Unterer S, Busch K. Acute hemorrhagic diarrhea syndrome in dogs. Vet Clin North Am Small Anim Pract. 2021;51(1):79-92. doi:10.1016/j.cvsm.2020.09.007
